0: Description NEWLINE_CHAR NEWLINE_CHAR EyeNote is a mobile device application to denominate Federal Reserve Notes (U.S. paper currency) as an aid for the blind or visually impaired to increase accessibility. Users can have the denomination of a note scanned and communicated back to the user. NEWLINE_CHAR NEWLINE_CHAR NEWLINE_CHAR NEWLINE_CHAR EyeNote features continuous scanning. The scanning shall commence once the application has loaded and will denominate the currency. NEWLINE_CHAR NEWLINE_CHAR NEWLINE_CHAR NEWLINE_CHAR EyeNote version 3.0 works on the iPhone 5, 5S and greater, the 4th Generation iPod touch and greater, and iPad 2 and greater.
